titleInfo.title: Songs from A Room Supporting the Nashville Cats Exhibition (signed)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and blue on white) announcing Songs From the Room: Nashville works of Dylan and Cohen with Ron Cornelius, Charlie Daniels, Sylvie Simmons, and Bob Wilson at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 4. Event supports the Dylan, Cash, and the Nashville Cats exhibition at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum. Poster is signed by artists.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
